text: "Needles and Pins" is a 1963 rock song by Jackie DeShannon. It was written by Sonny Bono and Jack Nitzsche and went to number 1 in Canada. The most successful version is the 1964 song by The Searchers and went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, Ireland and South Africa and by Smokie in 1977. ==References== Category:1963 songs Category:Jackie DeShannon songs Category:The Searchers (band) songs Category:Petula Clark songs Category:Smokie (band) songs Category:The Ramones songs Category:Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers songs Category:Stevie Nicks songs Category:Cher songs Category:Jangle pop songs
title: Needles and Pins (song)
